caption: A woman in white observed three men, addressing one of them with a stern expression. The man, overcome with anger, slammed shut the lid of a coffin. In a fit of rage and unable to contain himself any longer, he shattered the coffin. It was evident that he was venting the pent-up anger inside him, nearing an emotional breakdown. The trio then moved to another room, where it seemed they were plotting something. The plan appeared to involve the enraged man executing one of the two other men. One of them, looking like his brother, even offered himself to be killed, hoping that it would enable their escape. However, the distraught man refused. In a desperate act, he pointed a gun at himself. The woman behind the scenes, witnessing this, became extremely anxious, scrambling to find a sedative needle to prevent a tragedy.
